roleset.name: begin, start, initiate
roleset.note: SPARK-V NOTES: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Member of VNcls engender-27. (from spark.01-v)

roles.note: only use Arg2 when it's separate fromthe Arg0. (from spark.01-v)

role.descr: instrument, if agent is also present

example.name: active
example.text: Dealers said that interpretation sparked expectations of an imminent bid by Ford.
example.arg: expectations of an imminent bid by Ford

example.name: passive
example.text: [The investment boom]-1 is mainly sparked *trace*, they say, by strong domestic demand and isn't likely to increase exports sharply.
